author: psmith
msg: Can now query the LoadEvent for all settings whose
keys begin with a particular string.

author: psmith
msg: Exposed the logger Tree panel visibilty though
the pref gui and the popup menu using the standard pattern.

author: psmith
msg: added the Scroll To Bottom to the pref GUI.
Also moved all the listener setup code for the Formatting pref
panel into it's own method as it was getting a bit hard to read.

author: psmith
msg: When no events were arriving, the Data Rate was not
being set to 0.

author: psmith
msg: More refactoring of the LogPanel Preferences, in particular the
state of the Detail panel, scrollToBottom, and tooltips now save
state.
Toolbars and menus now listening to the model rather than
querying the LogPanel directly.
Not all of properties have made it into the LogPanelPreferencePanel GUI,
as I ran out of time.
There is still the problem where if you hide the event detail panel and then
unhide it, the split pane does not seem to make room to show the panel.
Very frustrating, not sure if this is a bug in our code, or in Swing, but
a significant amount of time spent on it.  help.
